text: was a town located in Kume District, Okayama Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the town had an estimated population of 3,382 and a density of 40.75 persons per km². The total area was 82.99 km². On March 22, 2005, Asahi, along with the towns of Chūō and Yanahara (all from Kume District), was merged to create the town of Misaki. Category:Dissolved municipalities of Okayama Prefecture
title: Asahi, Okayama
